summary: The Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic, or Western Sahara, is a country claiming a territory in the Maghreb region of Africa. It was once a Spanish colony known as Spanish Sahara. SADR controls only a small part of the land it claims, with Morocco controlling the rest. It was established in 1976 by the Polisario Front. The capital is El Aai√∫n, but the government operates from Tifariti and Rabuni, Algeria, due to the ongoing dispute. SADR has diplomatic relations with many countries and is a member of the African Union. It has a small population, making it one of the least densely populated countries globally.
title: Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
